> ::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Havoc/Repressor::
>
> Zardus tries to dodge, one of the shots hitting him in the chest and
leaving
> a large dent. He growls. He was not going to let another shot like that
hit
> him.
>
> Zardus looks down at Grenade, Zardus fires two dozen more shots.

OOC: How high up is Zardus?

BIC: Grenade was paying attention to Feline and was hit in the back with
every shot. He made a whining squeal like metal scraping together. He looked
up to see Zardus. He fired up at Zardus with a missile.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Havoc laughs as he sees Beholder fall, another bomb emerging out of the
> WarMachine and flying at Beholder.

Beholder also is looking at Feline, who wouldn't want to kill her? Beholder
walks out from the way the bomb was falling, the explosion going up his back
and leaving him looking up in the air in shock.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A missile explodes against the bottom of Repressor, sending him spiralling
> before he recovers.
>
> He turns in the air, his weapons getting a lock on Gigas and Horn Drill
again.

Horn Drill actually managed to get away from the shots, but in the process,
he let Gigas be hit. Gigas doesn't notice and fires at Feline twice.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
